attributes.action: Step down at the earliest opportunity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the Prime Minister should step down at the earliest opportunity, realising further delay will damage the economy by the uncertainty of who will succeed him. His legacy has been blighted by the Iran War and heightened tension in Iraq; not stopping the offering of peerages for loans, not dealing with knife culture in deprived communities; failing to sort out the Health Service during his watch, presiding over a Home Office that has become a laughing stock; acting as a lap dog to an incompetent American president, increasing tension and security risks from the Muslim nations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
